friends.text:
May and Phyo have been great friends, but the others don't seem to agree.

Awarded the 3rd place at Filmfeste, a Raffles Institution event.

how.text:
A parody about how to make a film.

A film produced by the Raffles Film Society.

Diane finally has a friend, but something is not right.

Was it real, or just a dream?

postcard.title: Postcard
postcard.text:
A 48-hour challenge short film. All production was completed within the 48-hour time frame.

Premiered at the Gene Siskel Film Center.
Awarded the 2nd place at the 48·24·12 Video Challenge of ArtBash, a School of the Art Institute of Chicago event.

blackmirror.text: A fan page for the popular TV series Black Mirror.

gift.title: GiftPerfect
gift.text:
A website of a conceptual service in the future to help people pick the perfect gift for others using machine learning and big data.

A Research Studio project at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago.

homepage.title: jasonluo.me
homepage.text: A website dedicated to showcase my works in film and new media, coded from scratch.

mirrored.title: Mirrored
mirrored.text: A simple text-based web game created using Twine.

ptb.title: Push That Brick
ptb.text: A simple javascript web game created using p5.js.

timemachine.title: Time Machine
timemachine.text:
This is a project responding to this social media era where everyone is using the same platform for communication. People are always staring at their digital devices, looking at the same websites, the same apps, yet the content is tailored to each individual user.
This website synchronizes the screens across all devices visiting. But instead of targeted content, users are randomly assigned a video snippet of a childhood aniation show. The change happens at the same time for everyone.

A Core Studio project at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago.
